Headline: Normal Brown, Red and Purple Line Express Service Being Restored
ShortDescription: Some Brown, Red and Purple Line Express trains are running w/significant delays after an earlier medical emergency on the tracks at Belmont. Service is resuming

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Some Brown, Red and Purple Line Express trains are running with significant delays after an earlier medical emergency on the tracks at Belmont. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service. As a result of the delay:

  • Brown Line shuttle buses will continue to provide connecting service from Kimball to Fullerton in both directions.
  • Red Line shuttle buses will continue to provide connecting service from Addison to Fullerton in both directions.
  • Purple Line Express shuttle buses will continue to provide connecting service from Linden to Howard in both directions.
  • All shuttle bus service will conclude at 05:30 a.m.

Trains are now moving and service is resuming; allow extra travel time.
